patthana15.37:1.1_0: Nosaññojanaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana15.37:1.1_1: noganthaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana15.37:1.1_2: nooghaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noogho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana15.37:1.1_3: noyogaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noyogo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana15.37:1.1_4: nonīvaraṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana15.37:1.1_5: noparāmāsaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noparāmāso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
